titleStmt.title: The feast of feasts, or, The celebration of the sacred nativity of our blessed Lord and Saviour, Jesvs Christ grounded upon the Scriptures and confirmed by the practice of the Christian church in all ages.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Edward, fl. 1627-1655.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Fisher. Cf. DNB.
Oxford imprint counterfeited; actually printed in London.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
